title: News: Sigur Rós Unveil Details Of New Album Valtari
body:
**Sigur Rós** have just announced that May will see the release of their first studio album in almost four years.

**_Valtari_,** their sixth record will hit stores on 28 May and has been described by the group as _“ambient” “introverted” “floaty”_ and _“minimal”._ Bassist **Georg Hólm** said in an interview with **Q Magazine**, that the title (translated as “Steamroller”) alludes to the music, which _“just rolls over you. In a good way,”._

Lead singer **Jonsi** also revealed that as with the majority of their previous releases, _**Valtari**_ will contain no English lyrics whatsoever, despite their brief experimentation on **_Með suð í eyrum við spilum endalaust_** and on his own solo project. A work in progress tracklisting has also been released (see below) as well as a host of tour dates. As previously confirmed, **Bestival** will be their only UK festival appearance of 2012.
